## Alignment & Edge Cases

Examples showing different alignment syntaxes and a row with fewer cells (will be padded).

Metric | Details | Notes
---|:---:|---:
Throughput | **High** | measured in req/s
Latency | `~20ms` |
Errors | Low | monitoring: enabled
